hicpp-exception-baseclass.description:
Description

Ensure that every value that in a
throw
expression is an instance of
std::exception
.

This enforces
rule 15.1
of the High Integrity C++ Coding Standard.

class
custom_exception
{};
void
throwing
()
noexcept
(
false
)
{
// Problematic throw expressions.
throw
int
(
42
);
throw
custom_exception
();
}
class
mathematical_error
:
public
std
::
exception
{};
void
throwing2
()
noexcept
(
false
)
{
// These kind of throws are ok.
throw
mathematical_error
();
throw
std
::
runtime_error
();
throw
std
::
exception
();
}
